title: TREBETHERWICK
Description: A dynamic elm continuous waterfall coffee table, Trebetherwick is a sculptural piece. Its seamless smooth edges contrast with the earthy textures of the pippy elm and can left natural or finished with a burnt interior for a dramatic effect.

title: TREBETHERWICK
Description: A dynamic elm continuous waterfall coffee table, Trebetherwick is a sculptural piece. Its seamless smooth edges contrast with the earthy textures of the pippy elm and can left natural or finished with a burnt interior for a dramatic effect.

title: COTEHELE
Description: A truly show-stopping dining table made from singular piece of rare Scottish elm with a heavy amount of pippy detail and patterns in the wood, this table has been hand-plained and simply finished to show off the raw natural beauty of the wood. As a result, the blue, green and pearlescent colours of the wood and unique patterns and effects really shine through. This table is particularly special as its made from athrough and through piece of wood, with live edges on either side, taking the Elm tree trunk and slicing vertically through. This means that you see the whole life of that tree (it hasnt been split) detailed in the stunning markings on this table. Over 3.5 metres in length and 1.2 metres wide, this special edition piece is pictured on our solid steel legs finished in matt black, but other legs are available - get in touch to find out more.
